item.description:
Authentic Tapas Night Spanish Meetup at Barca Restaurant and Tapas Bar
Tuesday, November 11th at 7 p.m.

Join us for “un viaje” to the authentic tapas experience here in Hartford where tapas created by a chef from Spain will be served Spanish Bar/Café/ Restaurant style – on a bar counter with cañas (small glasses of Beer or wineto drink with tapas). A tapa is a small appetizer. Here’s the plan: for a cost of $12 dollars you will receive 4 tickets. You can trade your tickets for one of the tapas on the counter, one ticket per tapa. Pay extra and try a caña, one of several Spanish beers or wines.

Here is the list of tapas planned for this event*:

1.Tortilla Espanola – Spanish Omelett with Caramelized Onions, Roasted Red Peppers and Potatoes over Garlic Tomato Sauce

2. Setas del Monte Asadas con Mantequilla al Ajo – Wild Mushrooms Suateéd with Garlic and Butter servcied with Crusty Bread

3. Salmon Frito – Fried Seaweed Wrapped Citrus Salmon, Seaweed Salad

4. Chorizo – Spanish sausage in a tempting dish – to be determined

5. Combinación de Quesos Espanoles y Carnes Curadas – Combination of Assorted Spanish Cheeses and Cured Meats

*Note: there may be some variation in the final selection of tapas for this meetup

Eat, drink and be merry!

Barca is located at The Design Center, first floor, 1429 Park Street, Hartford, CT 06106, 860-724-4444. Visit the following website for a write up of this new Hartford restaurant: http://www.topix.com/...

Please RSVP by November 8th. Note: you can only RSVP Yes or No. There is not a Maybe option.

Questions: contact Karen at kdwo543210@yahoo.com

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tapas Night at Barca Restaurant and Tapas Bar
